title: Rideshare industry adapting to a changing smallsat market
key_assets: ["Spaceflight's payload processing facility", "Spaceflight's workforce", "Spaceflight's existing contracts"]
summary: Firefly Aerospace acquired Spaceflight, a major rideshare aggregator, to enhance its end-to-end space transportation services. The acquisition includes Spaceflight's payload processing facility and workforce, but Firefly will no longer aggregate payloads on non-Firefly launch vehicles.
why_it_matters: This acquisition consolidates the rideshare market and shifts Firefly Aerospace's strategy toward vertical integration, potentially impacting smallsat launch service dynamics and customer options.
relevance_reason: Target company not mentioned in summary
